name: Bradkeyesrealty
tagline: Brad's understanding of the fluctuating market and familiarity with the Los Angeles area gives his clients the most current and comprehensive information on which to draw when making important decisions. Skilled in both marketing and promotion, Brad creates marketing plans specific to each client's needs, ensuring that each home stands out amongst the competition and commands top dollar.
body:
Los Angeles is the home of the stars - and those who want to live like stars. The people residing in the city of angels know what is the good life , and live their lives in the culturally refined to experience all the good things that life has to offer. 

Los Angeles is known for its rich real estate , usually made ​​of beautiful homes, large buildings and condominiums from first class to beautiful ranches and charming farmhouses and barns . There are so many homes to choose from , all of which are worthy of the grandeur and sophistication that their collective reputation implies.

For more information: [first time home buyer mortgage](http://bradkeyesrealty.com/client.html) or visit us at simple website: http://bradkeyesrealty.com

Follow us on: [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sherley-Petit/400198323368569) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Bradkeyesrealt1)
